long_description: The Skullcandy Uprock headphones with microphone deliver rich, rockin' sound and sweet tones directly your ears with the ergonomic fit of a comfortable, over-the-ear design. Supreme sound lets you experience your music the way it was meant to be heard. Take and end calls on your iOS or Android phone with the simple, one-button Mic 1 remote; it also controls play/pause/forward/back for your music tracks. Dual-layer ear pillows double the padding for double the comfort. Skullcandy Uprock headphones feature a fully adjustable ladder headband that fits the shape of your head.
short_description: The Skullcandy Uprock headphones with microphone deliver rich, rockin' sound and sweet tones directly your ears with the ergonomic fit of a comfortable, over-the-ear design.
